mapper.select: /*selectItemDetailInfo*/ SELECT A.PRDT_NO as itemId, A.PRDT_PRCE as price, A.PRDT_NM as name, A.PRDT_DESC as itemDetail, B.IMG_URL as image, C.LIKE_CNT as likeCnt, D.CMT_CNTT FROM TB_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE B ON A.PRDT_NO = B.PRDT_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_SOCIAL C ON B.PRDT_NO = C.PRDT_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_COMMENT D ON C.PRDT_NO = D.PRDT_NO WHERE A.PRDT_NO = #{pdNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
/* selectProductCount */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_PRODUCT A

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT A.PRDT_NO as productId, B.PRDT_IMG_NO as imageNo, A.PRDT_PRCE as price , A.PRDT_NM as name , A.PRDT_DESC as detail , A.CRT_DT as createDate , A.UPD_DT as updateDate, GET_PRODUCT_IMAGE(B.PRDT_NO,B.PRDT_IMG_NO) as image FROM TB_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRDT_NO, MIN(PRDT_IMG_NO) PRDT_IMG_NO FROM TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE GROUP BY PRDT_NO ) B ON A.PRDT_NO = B.PRDT_NO ORDER BY A.CRT_DT DESC ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

/*selectMainPage*/ SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT MAX(A.PRDT_NO) as itemId, MAX(A.PRDT_PRCE) as price, MAX(A.PRDT_NM) as name, MAX(A.PRDT_DESC) as itemDetail, MAX(F.CATENAME) as cateName, MAX(B.IMG_URL) as image, MAX(C.LIKE_CNT) as likeCnt FROM TB_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE B ON A.PRDT_NO = B.PRDT_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_SOCIAL C ON B.PRDT_NO = C.PRDT_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY D ON A.CATECODE = D.CATECODE INNER JOIN TB_PRODUCT_BIGCATEGORY F ON D.CATECODEREF = F.CATECODEREF GROUP BY A.PRDT_NO ORDER BY likeCnt ASC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
